contents.text: Thank you for calling Envoy in San Francisco, your partner for secure, paperless visitor management on iPad.
For support with your Envoy visitor management system, press '1'.
For technical assistance with kiosk setup or photo capture, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you to a support specialist.

navigationGoals: Configure and troubleshoot my visitor kiosk’s camera setup for check-ins.
My lobby iPad kiosk camera isn’t capturing guest photos – I need help fixing it.
Debug the kiosk camera initialization error on my iPad visitor management system.
I need step-by-step help to set up the iPad kiosk and enable the visitor photo feature.
I need help setting up the iPad kiosk and resolving photo‐capture errors for our lab’s visitor sign-in station.

contents.text: For account and billing inquiries, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you to billing support.

navigationGoals: Review last month’s Envoy invoice and update my billing information.
I need to update my billing information and review my latest Envoy invoice.
Review the pro-rated fee applied to my Envoy Enterprise invoice this month.
I want to review my billing statements and update my payment details.
I’d like to review the latest invoice and clarify the billing charges for our department’s Envoy subscription.

contents.text: To speak with our sales team about Envoy solutions, press '2'.
To schedule a personalized product demo, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative.

navigationGoals: Book a personalized live demo of the Envoy system for our team.
I want to schedule a hands-on demo of the Envoy visitor management system.
Schedule a one-on-one demo highlighting Envoy’s REST API integration capabilities.
I'd like to schedule a guided demonstration of the Envoy system to understand its features.
I want to schedule a personalized Envoy product demo for our physics research group.

contents.text: For information on pricing and enterprise plans, press '2'.
Please hold while we retrieve the details.

navigationGoals: Get detailed pricing and enterprise plan options for Envoy.
I’m interested in enterprise pricing details and volume discounts for our offices.
Get enterprise plan tier pricing and SLA details for a 500-seat deployment.
I need details on enterprise pricing tiers and contract options.
I’m looking for detailed pricing and enterprise plan options to support multiple kiosks across campus.
